name: Graviga
description:
Graviga is a retro styled space shooter with gravity. You are in a space ship fighting against endless waves of aliens. This would seem like any other retro space shooter but wait, your bullets will curve around asteroids due to gravitational forces. You have  to use this to your advantaged in this fast paced shooter to destroy as many alien spaceships as you can. 

Controls:

W,A,S,D: Movement based on cursor position (W follows cursor)

Cursor: Aim

Mouse Left: Shoot

Credits:

This game was designed and created by two 7th graders for a school project. Made in Unity.
